platform.name: Easypaisa
platform.primary_use: Mobile payments, digital banking, money transfers

content.about: Easypaisa is Pakistan's first digital bank with over 55 million users, offering mobile payments, digital banking, and financial services. It has 18.2 million monthly active users and strong customer deposits.

seo.seoMetaTitle: Easypaisa Digital Wallet Pakistan - Mobile Payments & Banking
seo.seoMetaDescription: Easypaisa is Pakistan's leading digital bank and wallet with 55M+ users, offering mobile payments, digital loans, and international money transfers.
